title: 92/40/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 November 1991 amending Decision 90/90/EEC concerning the importation by Member States of live pigs, fresh pigmeat and pigmeat products from Austria and amending Decision 91/190/EEC concerning the animal health conditions and veterinary certificates for the import of domestic animals of the bovine and porcine species from Austria
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 November 1991  amending Decision 90/90/EEC concerning the importation by Member States of live pigs, fresh pigmeat and pigmeat products from Austria and amending Decision 91/190/EEC concerning the animal health  conditions and veterinary certificates for the import of domestic animals of the bovine and porcine species from Austria  (92/40/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1 (2) of Decision 90/90/EEC is hereby replaced by the following text:
'2. The suspension of imports referred to in paragraph 1 shall not apply to the Laender Vorarlberg, Tyrol, Salzburg, Upper Austria, Karnten and Burgenland.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 November 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 69. (3) OJ No L 61, 10. 3. 1990, p. 21. (4) OJ No L 34, 6. 2. 1991, p. 14. (5) OJ No L 96, 17. 4. 1991, p. 16.
